Class MenuUtils

  • java.lang.Object

      • onSpecialItemInventoryClick

        public static void onSpecialItemInventoryClick(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
        Prevents interactions with static and cosmetic items on click. Also triggers scroll effects and the main menu opening.
        Parameters:
        event - The inventory click event.

        Prevents interactions with static and cosmetic items on hotbar number press.
        Parameters:
        event - The inventory click event.
        Returns:
        If the event was not cancelled.

      • checkForStaticItem

        public static boolean checkForStaticItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
        Checks if the given item stack is a static item. No null check included.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The item stack to check.
        Returns:
        If it is a static item.
